column4: Hej! I have a question - and I am a Newbie with IRC, so bear with me.
I broke yesterday a wireless router - old and crappy Linksys that enabled me to connect both using a cable and a wireless. I know squat about routers.
I was wondering if you could recomend something that will work with ubuntu and won't cost too much - say up to 50$
routers are supposed to solve the network problems, not create one
